summary: tony’s loss through the eyes of thor (a drabble)
title: tony’s loss through the eyes of thor (a drabble)
body:
(Before Ragnarok, Odin had said, “Asgard is not a place, it’s a people.”)

(What Odin hadn’t anticipated, though, was Thanos. 

The people are gone now, too.) 

Thor might have lost more than any other Avenger. He’s lost his father, his brother, and his people, all in the span of a few weeks. 

Still, Thor sees that Tony’s sorrow goes deeper than his own. 

So, yes. Thor lost his father, his brother, his people. But Tony lost his child, and in the words of his mother Frigga, there is no greater pain than to outlive your own child. 

And to watch your own child die, die because it’s far too late to save them, die because he was fated to by the snap of two fingers? Thor can’t imagine a faith more gruesome. 

(After Loki had tried to kill Thor for a third time when they were young, Frigga had told him, “Do you know what they say, Loki, when a child is born? They say that a mother’s heart is then no longer her own. That it does no longer only beat for her, but also for her children. You will not kill your brother, Loki, for then, I shall only be a mere shell of my former self. And we both know you’d never want that.”) 

(Loki stopped trying to kill Thor for a while after that.)

(After Loki had tried to kill Thor for a third time when they were young, Frigga had told him, “Do you know what they say, Loki, when a child is born? They say that a mother’s heart is then no longer her own. That it does no longer only beat for her, but also for her children. You will not kill your brother, Loki, for then, I shall only be a mere shell of my former self. And we both know you’d never want that.”) 

(Loki stopped trying to kill Thor for a while after that.)

(What Odin hadn’t anticipated, though, was Thanos. 

The people are gone now, too.) 

Thor might have lost more than any other Avenger. He’s lost his father, his brother, and his people, all in the span of a few weeks. 

Still, Thor sees that Tony’s sorrow goes deeper than his own. 

So, yes. Thor lost his father, his brother, his people. But Tony lost his child, and in the words of his mother Frigga, there is no greater pain than to outlive your own child. 

And to watch your own child die, die because it’s far too late to save them, die because he was fated to by the snap of two fingers? Thor can’t imagine a faith more gruesome. 

(After Loki had tried to kill Thor for a third time when they were young, Frigga had told him, “Do you know what they say, Loki, when a child is born? They say that a mother’s heart is then no longer her own. That it does no longer only beat for her, but also for her children. blog.name: itsagentromanoff
blog.title: Tiny Tony
blog.description: Non Avengers Quotes | #TeamTonyStark | Profile photo: Petite-Madame

summary:
[Tony and Steve are in the living room and hear a noise from upstairs]
Steve: Tony! Are you aware of what's going on...
body:
[Tony and Steve are in the living room and hear a noise from upstairs]

Steve: Tony! Are you aware of what’s going on upstairs?

Tony: Uh-huh. Pete is with MJ.

Steve: And you have no objection?

Tony: He could be craftier about it, at least make an effort to sneak her in and out.

body:
Tony Potts

Pepper corrects someone calling her “future Ms. Stark” for the hundredth time that day and Tony jokes to Rhodey asking why they never ask him why he won’t take her name. Rhodey jokes back, and for the evening, Tony is Mr. Potts for his best friend and it’s great. But it’s just a joke, because how could he take his fiance’s name? He is Tony Stark, he always have been. Tony Stark, son of Howard Stark, owner of Stark Industries. But he hasn’t been in touch with Starks in ages and Pepper Potts runs the company now.

“Can you imagine Howard’s face if we renamed Stark Industries to Potts Industries?” He asks her one day and Pepper smiles. “Can you imagine his face if we renamed his son to Tony Potts?” Tony says then and and she is surprised and smiling even more and that’s the face he wants to imagine from now on.

Most of the board members of the company are there from the times when Stark Industries was a weapons manufacturer and some don’t take it well now when it’s Potts Industries.

In time, the Potts surname rolls of Tony’s hands like it was always his signature. “Mr. and Mrs. Potts” they call them and it does look good in capital white letters on the title page. “My wife” though are the best words his mouth can form.

Pepper and Tony Potts

Tony Potts

Pepper corrects someone calling her “future Ms. Stark” for the hundredth time that day and Tony jokes to Rhodey asking why they never ask him why he won’t take her name. Rhodey jokes back, and for the evening, Tony is Mr. Potts for his best friend and it’s great. But it’s just a joke, because how could he take his fiance’s name? He is Tony Stark, he always have been. Tony Stark, son of Howard Stark, owner of Stark Industries. But he hasn’t been in touch with Starks in ages and Pepper Potts runs the company now.

“Can you imagine Howard’s face if we renamed Stark Industries to Potts Industries?” He asks her one day and Pepper smiles. “Can you imagine his face if we renamed his son to Tony Potts?” Tony says then and and she is surprised and smiling even more and that’s the face he wants to imagine from now on.

Most of the board members of the company are there from the times when Stark Industries was a weapons manufacturer and some don’t take it well now when it’s Potts Industries.

In time, the Potts surname rolls of Tony’s hands like it was always his signature. “Mr. and Mrs. Potts” they call them and it does look good in capital white letters on the title page. “My wife” though are the best words his mouth can form.

Pepper and Tony Potts

blog.name: foundfanfictions
blog.title: Fanfiction Library
blog.description: Welcome to the fanfiction library, a blog dedicated to fanfictions. There are loads to read and share, and all are complete. After all, you've never heard of a library that lends out a half-finished book. _____________________________________ If you're looking for a specific fandom or ship, click the links "fandom" or "ships" below. To search for a specific tag, genre, type of fic, etc, use the search bar. _____________________________________ If you want to submit a fic, you are more than welcome to. Make sure the author is credited and to use correct tags for the fandom, ships, and genres. _____________________________________ photo credit for preview page: Jonas Tana via photopin cc

title: Brave new world
body:
Author: itsallAvengers

Fandom: Marvel

Rating: Teen

Words: 31,889

Summary:

When Steve is defrosted early by Howard Stark, who dedicated his retirement to searching for Captain America, he’s feeling rather lost in the world that has moved on without him. But Howard is happy to help, he gives him a place to stay and a friendly face, and for that Steve is grateful.

He also tells Steve that under no circumstances must he go near his son, Tony Stark. According to Howard, the man is a nasty piece of work. And really, it’s not like Howard would lie to him, right?

Wrong.

Link: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15877008

Review: Honestly I liked how this fic explores toxic relationships, manipulation, adjusting to a new life, and how to get past a bad start. Like, obviously these are huge subjects to tackle, but for a 30,000 word fic I think they’re tackled well. And stony is endgame, which is always reassuring and nice! Be prepared for angst along the way though.

title: The Problems with Social Media
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QUKeGg

by Once_Upon_A_Ghost_Story

Concept: Peter Parker making a Spiderman Instagram account that becomes verified and has over 1m followers and one night at 2 am when he’s making a depressing finsta post he accidentally posts it to SpiderManOfficial

(With slight changes, AKA Interwebs.)

blog.name: letsgetdowney
blog.title: like juice pops?
blog.description: irina. 25. tony stark is the real hero

summary: wow do you ever think about how tony stark’s brain is so breathtaking he can control a shapeshifting suit with only his MIND...
body: wow do you ever think about how tony stark’s brain is so breathtaking he can control a shapeshifting suit with only his MIND without needing any AI assistance and how his train of thought during a battle probably goes like “fuck yeah, lets SUIT UP motherfuckers, and now take these HUGE BLASTERS to your face, uh oh he recovered quickly i- SHIELD!! ok i need ANGEL WINGS we gotta fly away now” like wow what a nerd i love him
